TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WorkflowInvoker extends System.Object

summary.span: 如同方法叫用般，提供叫用工作流程的方法。

span.span: Provides a means for invoking a workflow as if it were a method call.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 同時包含以同步方式叫用工作流程的執行個體和靜態方法，以及以非同步方式叫用工作流程的執行個體方法。 contains both instance and static methods for invoking workflows synchronously, and instance methods for invoking workflows asynchronously. 不允許如保存、卸載或繼續書籤等執行個體控制項。 does not allow instance control such as persisting, unloading, or resuming bookmarks. 如果需要執行個體控制項，請改用 。If instance control is desired, use instead. 若要在沒有執行個體控制項的狀況下同步執行工作流程，請呼叫 方法。To execute workflows synchronously with no instance control, call the method. 若要在沒有執行個體控制項的狀況下非同步執行工作流程，請使用 和 方法配對，或 方法。To execute a workflow asynchronously with no instance control, use the and method pairs, or the method. ## Examples 下列範例會使用 ，以同步方式叫用由單一 活動組成的工作流程。The following example synchronously invokes a workflow consisting of a single activity using . remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在工作流程完成並擷取工作流程的輸出參數時收到通知，請從 方法呼叫 `callback`。To be notified when the workflow is complete and retrieve the output parameters of the workflow, call from the `callback` method. 如果在工作流程完成前呼叫 ，它會封鎖直到工作流程完成為止。If is called before the workflow completes, it blocks until the workflow completes. 若要設定工作流程必須完成的逾時間隔，請使用接受 的其中一個 多載。To configure a time-out interval in which the workflow must complete, use one of the overloads that take a . 這個方法會使用 非同步設計模式，以非同步方式叫用工作流程。This method invokes a workflow asynchronously using the asynchronous design pattern. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 非同步程式設計的概觀](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm.md)。For more information, see [Asynchronous Programming Overview](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm.md). ## Examples 下列範例會叫用由 `LongRunningDiceRoll` 活動組成的工作流程。The following example invokes a workflow consisting of a `LongRunningDiceRoll` activity. `LongRunningDiceRoll` 活動具有兩個輸出引數，這些引數代表擲骰作業的結果。The `LongRunningDiceRoll` activity has two output arguments that represent the results of the dice roll operation. 您可以透過呼叫 ，擷取這些引數。These are retrieved by calling . 當 的呼叫傳回時，每個輸出引數都會傳入 outputs 字典 (以引數名稱做為索引鍵)。When the call to returns, each output argument is returned in the outputs dictionary, keyed by argument name. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在工作流程完成並擷取工作流程的輸出參數時收到通知，請從 方法呼叫 `callback`。To be notified when the workflow is complete and retrieve the output parameters of the workflow, call from the `callback` method. 如果在工作流程完成前呼叫 ，它會封鎖直到工作流程完成為止。If is called before the workflow completes, it blocks until the workflow completes. 如果工作流程沒有在指定的逾時間隔內完成，則工作流程會中止並在呼叫 方法時擲回 。If the workflow does not complete within the specified time-out interval the workflow is aborted and a is thrown when the method is called. > [!NOTE] > 只有在超過逾時間隔及工作流程在執行期間變成閒置狀態時，才會擲回 。The is only thrown if the time-out interval elapses and the workflow becomes idle during execution. 需要比指定的逾時間隔還長的時間才能完成的工作流程，會在工作流程沒有變成閒置狀態時成功完成。A workflow that takes longer than the specified time-out interval to complete completes successfully if the workflow does not become idle. 這個方法會使用 非同步設計模式，以非同步方式叫用工作流程。This method invokes a workflow asynchronously using the asynchronous design pattern. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 非同步程式設計的概觀](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm.md)。For more information, see [Asynchronous Programming Overview](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm.md). ## Examples 下列範例會叫用由 `LongRunningDiceRoll` 活動組成的工作流程。The following example invokes a workflow consisting of a `LongRunningDiceRoll` activity. `LongRunningDiceRoll` 活動具有兩個輸出引數，這些引數代表擲骰作業的結果。The `LongRunningDiceRoll` activity has two output arguments that represent the results of the dice roll operation. 您可以透過呼叫 ，擷取這些引數。These are retrieved by calling . 當 的呼叫傳回時，每個輸出引數都會傳入 outputs 字典 (以引數名稱做為索引鍵)。When the call to returns, each output argument is returned in the outputs dictionary, keyed by argument name. remarks.format: ## Remarks 只能取消其中一個接受 參數的 `userState` 多載所叫用之工作流程。Only a workflow invoked by one of the overloads that takes a `userState` parameter can be canceled. 如果取消成功，屬性傳遞至處理常式設定為`true`; 否則它會設定為`false`。If the cancellation succeeds, the property of the passed to the handler is set to `true`; otherwise, it is set to `false`. ## Examples 下列範例會叫用由 `LongRunningDiceRoll` 活動組成的工作流程。The following example invokes a workflow consisting of a `LongRunningDiceRoll` activity. `LongRunningDiceRoll` 活動具有兩個輸出引數，這些引數代表擲骰作業的結果。The `LongRunningDiceRoll` activity has two output arguments that represent the results of the dice roll operation. 一旦叫用此工作流程，主機就會嘗試取消工作流程。Once the workflow is invoked, the host attempts to cancel the workflow. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會封鎖至工作流程完成為止，包括閒置時間。This method blocks until the workflow has completed, including idle time. 所有工作流程執行都一定會在叫用執行緒上執行。All workflow execution is guaranteed to execute on the invoking thread. 若要設定工作流程必須完成的逾時間隔，請使用接受 的其中一個 多載。To configure a time-out interval in which the workflow must complete, use one of the overloads that take a . ## Examples 下列範例會叫用由單一 `DiceRoll` 活動組成的工作流程。The following example invokes a workflow consisting of a single `DiceRoll` activity. `DiceRoll` 活動具有兩個輸出引數，這些引數代表擲骰作業的結果。The `DiceRoll` activity has two output arguments that represent the results of the dice roll operation. 當 `Invoke` 的呼叫傳回時，每個輸出引數都會傳入 outputs 字典 (以引數名稱做為索引鍵)。When the call to `Invoke` returns, each output argument is returned in the outputs dictionary, keyed by argument name. 工作流程會叫用兩次，使用傳遞至工作流程定義`WorkflowInvoker`建構函式。The workflow is invoked twice, using the workflow definition passed into the `WorkflowInvoker` constructor. [!code-csharp[CFX_WorkflowInvokerExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/cfx_workflowinvokerexample/cs/program.cs#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會封鎖至工作流程完成為止，包括閒置時間。This method blocks until the workflow has completed, including idle time. 所有工作流程執行都一定會在叫用執行緒上執行。All workflow execution is guaranteed to execute on the invoking thread. 若要設定工作流程必須完成的逾時間隔，請使用接受 的其中一個 多載。To configure a time-out interval in which the workflow must complete, use one of the overloads that take a . ## Examples 下列範例會叫用由具有兩個輸入引數和兩個輸出引數之單一 `Divide` 活動組成的工作流程。The following example invokes a workflow consisting of a single `Divide` activity that has two input arguments and two output arguments. 叫用此工作流程時，系統會傳遞包含每個輸入引數之值 (以引數名稱做為索引鍵) 的 `arguments` 字典。When the workflow is invoked, the `arguments` dictionary is passed which contains the values for each input argument, keyed by argument name. 當傳回 `Invoke` 的呼叫時，每個輸出引數都會傳入 `outputs` 字典 (也以引數名稱做為索引鍵)。When the call to `Invoke` returns, each output argument is returned in the `outputs` dictionary, also keyed by argument name. [!code-csharp[CFX_WorkflowInvokerExample#120](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/cfx_workflowinvokerexample/cs/program.cs#120)] [!code-csharp[CFX_WorkflowInvokerExample#22](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/cfx_workflowinvokerexample/cs/program.cs#22)] 如果工作流程衍生自，這類`CodeActivity`或是`Activity`，而且除了定義完善的輸出引數輸出引數的非泛型多載`Invoke`，此類，必須使用若要擷取的其他引數的順序。If the workflow derives from , such as `CodeActivity` or `Activity`, and there are output arguments in addition to the well-defined output argument, a non-generic overload of `Invoke`, such as this one, must be used in order to retrieve the additional arguments. 若要這樣做，工作流程定義傳遞給`WorkflowInvoker`建構函式必須是型別。To do this, the workflow definition passed into the `WorkflowInvoker` constructor must be of type . 在此範例中`Divide`活動衍生自`CodeActivity`，但宣告為使這個多載`Invoke`，它會傳回而不是單一的傳回值的引數的字典會使用。In this example the `Divide` activity derives from `CodeActivity`, but is declared as so that this overload of `Invoke`, which returns a dictionary of arguments instead of a single return value, is used. param.name: timeout

span.span: The interval in which the workflow must complete before it is aborted and a is thrown.

summary.span: 使用指定的逾時間隔，以同步方式叫用工作流程。

span.span: Invokes a workflow synchronously with the specified time-out interval.

returns.span: 根活動之 和 值 (以引數名稱作為索引鍵) 的字典，這些值代表工作流程的輸出。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會封鎖至工作流程完成為止，包括閒置時間。This method blocks until the workflow has completed, including idle time. 所有工作流程執行都一定會在叫用執行緒上執行。All workflow execution is guaranteed to execute on the invoking thread. 如果工作流程沒有在指定的逾時間隔內完成，則工作流程會中止並擲回 。If the workflow does not complete within the specified time-out interval the workflow is aborted and a is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 只有在超過逾時間隔及工作流程在執行期間變成閒置狀態時，才會擲回 。The is only thrown if the time-out interval elapses and the workflow becomes idle during execution. 需要比指定的逾時間隔還長的時間才能完成的工作流程，會在工作流程沒有變成閒置狀態時成功完成。A workflow that takes longer than the specified time-out interval to complete completes successfully if the workflow does not become idle. ## Examples 下列範例會叫用包含兩個 活動以及一個使用 為一分鐘所設定之 活動的工作流程。The following example invokes a workflow that contains two activities and a activity configured with a of one minute. 系統會叫用此工作流程兩次：第一次使用兩分鐘的逾時間隔，而第二次使用 30 秒的逾時間隔。This workflow is invoked twice; the first time with a time-out interval of two minutes, and the second time with a time-out interval of 30 seconds. 第一個工作流程會順利完成，但是第二個卻不會，因而擲回 並顯示下列訊息。The first workflow completes successfully, but the second one does not and a is thrown and the following message is displayed. ```Output The operation did not complete within the allotted timeout of 00:00:30. The time allotted to this operation may have been a portion of a longer timeout. ``` [!code-csharp[CFX_WorkflowInvokerExample#51](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/cfx_workflowinvokerexample/cs/program.cs#51)] 如需使用的範例`Invoke`輸出引數時，請參閱的多載使用這個多載，而不需要的逾時間隔為相同的參數。For an example of using `Invoke` with output arguments, see the overload of with the same parameters as this overload without the time-out interval.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會封鎖至工作流程完成為止，包括閒置時間。This method blocks until the workflow has completed, including idle time. 所有工作流程執行都一定會在叫用執行緒上執行。All workflow execution is guaranteed to execute on the invoking thread. 如果工作流程沒有在指定的逾時間隔內完成，則工作流程會中止並擲回 。If the workflow does not complete within the specified time-out interval the workflow is aborted and a is thrown. > [!NOTE] > 只有在超過逾時間隔及工作流程在執行期間變成閒置狀態時，才會擲回 。The is only thrown if the time-out interval elapses and the workflow becomes idle during execution. 需要比指定的逾時間隔還長的時間才能完成的工作流程，會在工作流程沒有變成閒置狀態時成功完成。A workflow that takes longer than the specified time-out interval to complete completes successfully if the workflow does not become idle. ## Examples 下列範例會叫用包含兩個 活動以及一個使用 為一分鐘所設定之 活動的工作流程。The following example invokes a workflow that contains two activities and a activity configured with a of one minute. 系統會叫用此工作流程兩次：第一次使用兩分鐘的逾時間隔，而第二次使用 30 秒的逾時間隔。This workflow is invoked twice; the first time with a time-out interval of two minutes, and the second time with a time-out interval of 30 seconds. 第一個工作流程會順利完成，但是第二個卻不會，因而擲回 並顯示下列訊息。The first workflow completes successfully, but the second one does not and a is thrown and the following message is displayed. ```Output The operation did not complete within the allotted timeout of 00:00:30. The time allotted to this operation may have been a portion of a longer timeout. ``` [!code-csharp[CFX_WorkflowInvokerExample#51](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/cfx_workflowinvokerexample/cs/program.cs#51)] 如需使用的範例`Invoke`輸入和輸出引數時，請參閱的多載使用這個多載，而不需要的逾時間隔為相同的參數。For an example of using `Invoke` with input and output arguments, see the overload of with the same parameters as this overload without the time-out interval.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以處理這個事件，以便判斷使用其中一個 多載所叫用的工作流程是否已順利完成，並且擷取已完成工作流程的輸出引數。Handle this to determine whether a workflow invoked with one of the overloads completed successfully and to retrieve the output arguments of the completed workflow. ## Examples 下列範例會叫用由 `LongRunningDiceRoll` 活動組成的工作流程。The following example invokes a workflow consisting of a `LongRunningDiceRoll` activity. `LongRunningDiceRoll` 活動具有兩個輸出引數，這些引數代表擲骰作業的結果。The `LongRunningDiceRoll` activity has two output arguments that represent the results of the dice roll operation. 工作流程完成時， 處理常式就會擷取這些引數。When the workflow completes these are retrieved in the handler.
